article: libyan leader moammar gadhafi hailed a `` new era '' in relations with italy on wednesday , saying a history of hatred and destruction during italy 's unk rule had been replaced by a future of friendship and cooperation .
abstract: gadhafi visits italy for #st time as ties improve
